Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: My teachers are professionals and experts in my field of study and are also assignment mark instructors. Therefore, for assignments, listening to their options is better than AI.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Teachers are more precise than AI. Most of the time, AI can just give you overall and simple feedback; it is not deep enough.
